text: Nahak makhoiga chatminou aduga makhoiga loinana sengdokpagi thouram adu saruk yaminnou aduga makhoigi laininggi sengdokpagi senpham adu nahakna piyu, maduna makhoi lu kokpa yaragani. Adu oirabadi nanggi maramda makhoida haiba paodamsing adu achumba amata natte nahak nasamak Moses-ki Wayel Yathanggi matung inna hingli haiba makhoi pumnamakna khanggani.
